meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Milord</kanji>'s <kanji>hall</kanji> is a nice place. It's where a lord would live. A <vocabulary>palace</vocabulary>. By extension, this can also mean a <vocabulary>sanctuary</vocabulary>, and even a <vocabulary>hall of fame</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
